  • Account security

  • Phone scams

  • Information protection
Mobile Security
  • App security
  • Wi-Fi safety
  • Device management
  • BYOD policies

Flexible Training Formats

Multiple delivery methods to suit your organization's needs and preferences

Interactive E-Learning
15-30 minutes per module
Self-paced online courses with interactive elements and progress tracking
Capacity: Unlimited participants
  • Gamification
  • Progress tracking
  • Certificates
  • Mobile-friendly
Virtual Workshops
1-2 hours per session
Live online training sessions with expert instructors and Q&A
Capacity: Up to 50 participants
  • Live interaction
  • Real-time Q&A
  • Recording available
  • Breakout sessions
On-Site Training
Half or full day
In-person training delivered at your organization by security experts
Capacity: Up to 30 participants
  • Customized content
  • Hands-on exercises
  • Face-to-face interaction
  • Team building
Lunch & Learn Sessions
30-45 minutes
Informal training sessions during lunch breaks for convenient learning
Capacity: Up to 25 participants
  • Casual format
  • Current topics
  • Q&A session
  • Light refreshments

Remote Workers

  • Cloud security
  • Communication tools
